portfolio_1.portfolio_description: Grouped users can view youtube video simultaneously sharing their current reactions. Each user can upload own video comments.

portfolio_2.portfolio_title: Our goal is to help Customers to get fresh foods within the shortest possible time.
portfolio_2.portfolio_description: Farmershub360 is a platform that allows farmers around the world to be able to showcase their farm produces to the customer or to distributors that can buy directly from the farmers. Farmerhub360.com is an online portal available 24/7 to the internet customers, It ís a virtual online market place facilitation easy buying and selling of farm produces such as Livestock, Aquaculture, Crops, Farm Equipments and Farm services such as Veterinary Doctors e.t.c

portfolio_3.portfolio_description: Selling various kinds of goods including books, video games...

portfolio_4.portfolio_description: Navigation tool that significantly increases efficiency by reducing the number of clicks it takes you to navigate the web.

portfolio_5.portfolio_title: An E-commerce Application For Buying Cotton Products.
portfolio_5.portfolio_description: Shoprrr is an e-commerce platform catered towards giving the best and fast experience for customers to buy cotton products, we call its a frictionless process from start to finish.

portfolio_6.portfolio_description: PengolinCoin (PGO) is a Proof of Stake (PoS), open source, decentralized blockchain-based cryptocurrency utilizing the zkSNARKS and Sapling privacy protocols for shielded transactions. PengolinCoin is focused on user privacy, achieving fast and inexpensive transactions, an active and involved community, and real-world utilization.

portfolio_7.portfolio_description: Classic Swaggos are a collection of 10,000 NFT’s that have their own unique designs. There is a order of rarity that makes certain ones more valuable than the others. With minting these you have the chance of getting a super rare Swaggo. Rarity is not everything as some people may like a certain type of design for building a collection. Making minting these fun and exciting!

portfolio_8.portfolio_description: This website helps users to swap multi chain tokens.

portfolio_9.portfolio_description: The Doge Pound is a collection of 10,000 dogs themed NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) designed with various permutations and combinations of features such as the image background, clothing, earring, eyes, eyewear, mouth, fur, and hat. The entire collection is living on the Ethereum blockchain as ERC-721 tokens. It is the first collection launched under the Doge Pound Studios brand.

portfolio_10.portfolio_category: Category: AWS S3, Lambda, SQS, MediaConvert, C++
portfolio_10.portfolio_description: Designed and implemented media conversion automation pipeline using AWS services and c++ multi-threading
